questions.question: Considering the overall textual presentation, what is the dominant color of the lettering depicting the product's origin and material?

If you were to describe the general shape of the complete text block on this product's information tag, what single word would you use?
In terms of style, how would you classify the typeface used in printing the product information on the label?
Disregarding punctuation, what is the main word illustrating the natural cultivation method of this product's material?
Focusing only on the visible textual information, what is the key raw material specified for this product's manufacture?
Observing the textual layout, what is the predominant direction of the writing within the visual frame?
